psf_scripts.compare module¶

COMPARISON SCRIPT

This module is executable and compares the results of the deconvolution script with the original and observed data.

Author:Samuel Farrens <samuel.farrens@gmail.com>
Version:1.1
Date:10/01/2017

This method sets the script arguments

Make plots

This method generates the comparison plots

Input data, 3D array

Output file name
psf_scripts.compare.make_tidy(data)[source]¶

Make tidy

This method rounds pixel values to 6 decimal places

Parameters:

data : np.ndarray

Input data, 3D array

This method runs the script
